Group hierarchy: I have selected one-year reserve instances on ec2-instance service for the same instance type. It reduced the montly cost drascitally. I have taken similar approach on the RDS service too and able to reduce around 40% - 50% on the total monthly cost. I understand choosing reserved instances itself is a great cost saviour in the AWS monthly bill.
